song.title: 0105. In The Heat of The Sauna (feat. Starfall) (compo version)
song.info:
Mainly used beer to create this track. [artist]wiseman[/artist] was involved and so was my big brother.
[b]VERSE 1:[/b] Screw this. I'm leavin' town. I'm gonna miss the parties around. Oh-woa-ow We had the best times of our lives. Even when Lukelove was p-p-playing
Remember that strange weird tune going: "Indi indi indi indi indi indian" Or the time when we danced to some weird finnish demo songs This is our tribute song to, the scene
[b]BRIDGE:[/b] Nectarine... Forever Nectarine... don't GO Nectarine... Forever Nectarine.. OH -beep- GO!
[b]CHORUS:[/b] Open your beer, we're gonna demo party... Boozing all night, until we've won the compo... Pour up your beer, in the heat of the sauna... Boozing all night, until the sun has set.
[b]VERSE 2:[/b] -beep-ed up, I went out for a smoke, Looked up at the stars, felt the breeze of the cars. a Girl in her top, with her long-legs she rocks. I can feel the urge I'm not one of the nerds. Seven~eight cold, I started to mumble jumbo mumbo, just believed that I'm Rambo. Holding this gun, locked and loaded I'm feeling mighty, mighty tighty Remember that strange tune going woa oh, uh oh oh
Bridge/2 Chorus x3
